name: Unusual Debris 5
description: While diving for treasure in Sawtooth Bay, an adventurer sighted a disrupted portal.

name: Unusual Debris 2
description: A guard at Steampipe Steading filed a report on an odd flash of light across the canyon.

description: A recipe to make the Mistbreaker hammer.

name: Swim-Speed Infusion +12
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Infuses character with increased swimming speed.

Used to chop down all saplings.

name: Shrine Guardian Jackal Skin
description: Double-click to unlock this jackal mount skin for your account.

name: Champion's Chalice
description:
Double-click to display your Champion's Chalice.
<c=@flavor>This was earned by prevailing at the highest levels of competition in the Mists.</c>

name: Forester's Harvesting Sickle
description:
Used to gather all plants.

Grants a chance to receive bonus wood logs in addition to your gathering results. Material types are determined by your character level and location in the world.

name: Elonian Elementalist Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Sunspear Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Glyph of the Forester
description: Double-click to apply this to a gathering tool.

buff.description: Grants a 33% chance to reward bonus wood logs while gathering, in addition to gathering results. Material types are determined by your character level and location in the world.

name: Forester's Logging Axe
description:
Used to chop down all saplings.

Grants a chance to receive bonus wood logs in addition to your gathering results. Material types are determined by your character level and location in the world.

description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

name: Forester's Mining Pick
description:
Used to mine all metals.

Grants a chance to receive bonus wood logs in addition to your gathering results. Material types are determined by your character level and location in the world.

name: Grandmaster Mark Shard
description: Can be traded for grandmaster marks.

description:
Double-click to bind this glyph to your account.

Grants a 33% chance to reward bonus wood logs while gathering, in addition to gathering results. Material types are determined by your character level and location in the world.

name: Venom Warblade
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword. This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.

description: Double-click to unlock this griffon mount skin for your account.

description: Double-click to unlock this raptor mount skin for your account.

description: Double-click to unlock this skimmer mount skin for your account.

name: Central Tyria Waypoint Unlock Cache
description: Contains a set of the waypoint unlockers from the Waypoint Unlock Box. Consumables can only be used on one character.

name: Magnificent Hummingbird Skimmer Skin
description: Double-click to unlock this skimmer mount skin for your account.

description: Configure enough basic-function gravimetric tunneling field oscillator turrets to discover the level 2 upgrade.

name: Nerashi's Artifact
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the legendary Sunspear, Nerashi.</c>

name: Domain of Kourna Griffon Expert: Bronze
Domain of Kourna Griffon Master: Bronze
Recipe: Nerashi's Musket
description: A recipe to make an ascended rifle with Plaguedoctor's (+Condition Damage, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.

name: Mini Basenji
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Awakened Dye Kit
description:
Contains one random armor dye from a pool of 25 colors that includes six exclusive colors.

Dyes can be unlocked for unlimited use to color armor on all characters. Dye bottles can also be recycled in the Mystic Forge.

name: Nerashi's Claymore
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the legendary Sunspear, Nerashi.</c>

description: A piece of a schematic that details how to configure a direct damage field tech turret.

description: A pet dog that you can play with in the world and teach new tricks over time. Double-click to unlock this item in your wardrobe.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

description: Can be traded with vendors in the Domain of Kourna or consumed for volatile magic.

description: Configure enough level 3 gravimetric tunneling field oscillator turrets to discover the level 4 upgrade.

name: Nerashi's Striders
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the legendary Sunspear, Nerashi.</c>

name: Spare Parts
description: Various bits and pieces of Inquest tech found in the Domain of Kourna. Could be useful if you need to manipulate Inquest technology being used by the Awakened there.

description: Double-click to transform into a swarm of miniature golems.

Used to craft the legendary warhorn precursor Call of the Void.
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Mystic Runestones, a Gift of Wood, and a Gift of the Mists to create the Gift of Verdarach.
